verses.text: The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
When the wicked, even* mine enemies and my foes, came upon me to eat up my flesh, they stumbled and fell.+ 27.2 came…: Heb. approached against me*
Though an host should encamp against me, my heart shall not fear: though war should rise against me, in this will* I be* confident.

One thing* have I desired of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, and to enquire in his temple.+ 27.4 the beauty: or, the delight*
For in the time of trouble he shall hide me in his pavilion: in the secret of his tabernacle shall he hide me; he shall set me up upon a rock.

And now shall mine head be lifted up above mine enemies round about me: therefore will I offer in his tabernacle sacrifices of joy; I will sing, yea, I will sing praises unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**.+ 27.6 joy: Heb. shouting*
Hear, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, when* I cry with my voice: have mercy also upon me, and answer me.
When thou saidst*, Seek ye my face; my heart said unto thee, Thy face, \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, will I seek.+ 27.8 When…: or, My heart said unto thee, Let my face seek thy face, etc*
Hide not thy face far* from me; put not thy servant away in anger: thou hast been my help; leave me not, neither forsake me, O God of my salvation.
When my father and my mother forsake me, then the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** will take me up.+ 27.10 take…: Heb. gather me*
Teach me thy way, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, and lead me in a plain path, because of mine enemies.+ 27.11 a plain…: Heb. a way of plainness*+ 27.11 mine…: Heb. those which observe me*
Deliver me not over unto the will of mine enemies: for false witnesses are risen up against me, and such as breathe out cruelty.
I had fainted*, unless I had believed to see the goodness of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** in the land of the living.
Wait on the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**.
